EmailTemplate.name: EMEA_Event_Spring London_London_Q217.Spring London Invite 4-21-17
EmailTemplate.subject: You're invited: Spring London – Let’s build a better enterprise
EmailTemplate.textOnly: <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=confirmation-link&utm_campaign=spring_london_q22017]]> Spring London Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, There has never been a better time to be a developer, technology is evolving at an overwhelming speed. Spring has never been more relevant, but is also rapidly advancing and adding flexibility to the programming model for cloud-native, reactive and functional workloads. Join us for Spring London, an event for the Spring community. You will gain insight into cloud-native microservices using Spring Boot and Spring Cloud Services. There has never been a better time to be a developer, technology is evolving at an overwhelming speed. Spring has never been more relevant, but is also rapidly advancing and adding flexibility to the programming model for cloud-native, reactive and functional workloads. Developers using Spring will accelerate application development at start-up speed leveraging the latest features to minimise time to production, improve ease of coding and increase efficiency. Date: Tuesday 9 May, 2017 Time: 9.00am - 4.15pm Location: Pivotal, 2nd Floor, The Warehouse 211 Old Street, London, EC1V 9NR map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/211+Old+St,+London+EC1V+9NR,+UK/@51.5259343,-0.090919,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x48761ca61bf76b2d:0x89c21dcce87fd5a1!8m2!3d51.5259343!4d-0.0887303?mkt_tok=eyJpIjoiWVRrMk5UazFZell5TkdOaiIsInQiOiJzNFkxN2x1XC90MjdKWU84QzJOMDVrZ1IzTkd1Z0pGTWE3Mk9VS296ZVMrcU1tdXNsUDJYclpBS2tQd0FINTRjT1VhXC9cL2thckVmakRKd1lzT09LcXRGUT09In0%3D]]> All attendees to Spring London will receive a $100 discount to SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=confirmation-link&utm_campaign=spring_london_q22017]]> in December. If you have any questions, please email Phil Reay at preay@pivotal.io <[[mailto:preay@pivotal.io]]>. Sincerely, The Pivotal Team Register <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/spring-london.html?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=confirmation-link&utm_campaign=spring_london_q22017]]>
